long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your browsing experience with ChatGPT-powered AI insights for product and news summaries on supported websites.

⦿ No account needed
Just install and start enjoying AI-powered insights.

⦿ Product Summaries
Access key details from product descriptions and customer reviews without opening individual product pages.

⦿ News Article Summaries
Obtain concise article summaries and historical context without having to read lengthy news articles.

⦿ Easy Usage
Hover over a link on a compatible website or right-click and select 'Insights on current tab' for insights on the current article.

⦿ Supported Websites
Wide-ranging compatibility with popular e-commerce platforms like Amazon [US, UK, DE], news sources like BBC [US, UK], and Wikipedia.

⦿ Multilingual Support
Experience AI-generated summaries and insights in up to 187 languages for seamless browsing in your preferred language.

⦿ Browse with ease of mind. 
We do not ask for or store any personal data. We do not track any personally identifiable browsing behaviour or history.
